short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for watching Videos with your friends and family.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you thought of going on a movie date but your partner lives very far? Here is a solution for this problem. Gather your friends and partner and join them in a room with your favourite shows. No buffering issues, no quality issues, just flawless movie experience on Netflix, Hotstar, and Youtube and many more to come.
